Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03

Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card.cardObjective
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.card
     
  • Class
    Description
    CalculateScoreStrategy
    This interface defines the method for calculating Objective card points.
    CalculateScoreStrategyAdapter
    This class is used to provide Gson with a custom TypeAdapter to handle the deserialization of classes that implement the CalculateScoreStrategy interface.
    CardObjective
    This class represents a Objective card.
    MainDiagonalStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the main diagonal.
    PileBottomLeftStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the bottom left corner of a card.
    PileBottomRightStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the bottom right corner of a card.
    PileTopLeftStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the top left corner of a card.
    PileTopRightStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the pile starting from the top right corner of a card.
    RequirementStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the number of values.
    SecondaryDiagonalStrategy
    This class calculates the points of Objective cards that use the secondary diagonal.
